Why us?

Iris Power specializes in C&I, Residential and Community Solar PV/PV+ESS projects.

Dedicated to empowering commercial/industrial real estate owners as well as land owners to unlock the full potential of their properties. With a focus on sustainability and financial efficiency, Iris Power offers tailored solutions designed to maximize the benefit out of the property as well as the systems proposed. By leveraging the extensive benefits of solar energy, they provide comprehensive strategies that not only reduce environmental impact but also provide an in depth financial analysis. Through meticulous analysis and strategic implementation, Iris Power ensures that every property owner can capitalize on the immense opportunities presented by solar energy, fostering long-term sustainability and financial prosperity.

Energy solutions

Solar Project Design & Installation

PV & Energy storage solution projects in both front & behind the mirror.

Commercial & Industrial

Unlocking Solar Solutions for Commercial & Industrial Ventures: Tailored PV & Energy Storage Installations, Empowering Your Team with Streamlined Purchasing Autonomy.

Residential

Elevating Home Energy Solutions: Customizable Solar Projects with Individualized Spending Controls and Purchase Flexibility for Every Household Member.

Community Solar

Harmonizing Community Energy Needs: Comprehensive Platform for Balancing Team Satisfaction and Financial Viability in Solar Initiatives.
